title: Wear Counter
summary: A simple counter for Android Wear
description: FEATURES • Customizable incrementation• 6 themes (blue, green, red, orange, yellow, and purple)• Fully independent from a phone, making it compatible with watches paired either Android or iOS devices (if using Android Wear 2.0) SOURCE CODE Github https://github.com/ericfabreu/WearCounter
descriptionHTML:
FEATURES
• Customizable incrementation
• 6 themes (blue, green, red, orange, yellow, and purple)
• Fully independent from a phone, making it compatible with watches paired either Android or iOS devices (if using Android Wear 2.0)

SOURCE CODE
Github https://github.com/ericfabreu/WearCounter
comments: Simple and effective.  Exactly what I was looking for in a Wear counter app.  Thanks.
recentChanges: - Pull-up drawer with the settings and reset buttons
- Make app available on the Android Wear 2.0 Play Store, adding support for iOS devices
- Much smaller app size (about five times smaller)
